summary: Feature request to allow TLS client certificate and key to be passed as strings instead of Buffers, eliminating the need for Buffer.from() conversions when using environment variables.
userImpact: Reduces boilerplate code and improves convenience for users configuring TLS certificates from environment variables.
proposedFix: Support Buffer | { content: string | Buffer } | { path: string } to allow strings while directing users toward the correct format.
workaround: Use Buffer.from() to convert string environment variables to Buffers.
resolutionDetails: Implemented support for strings in addition to Buffers for clientCertPair configuration.
keyQuote: So that I don't have to use `Buffer.from` with env vars
